goal: Move bench.sh from root to scripts/bench.sh. Update any references.

tasks.title: Move bench.sh to scripts/bench.sh
tasks.description: Move bench.sh from the repository root to scripts/bench.sh. Update the script's internal path calculations (SCRIPT_DIR and PROJECT_ROOT) to reflect the new location. Create the scripts/ directory if it doesn't exist.

tasks.title: Update BENCHMARKS.md references
tasks.description: Update all references to bench.sh in BENCHMARKS.md from './wasm/bench.sh' to './scripts/bench.sh' (or the correct relative path from repo root).
